targets.query:
from(bucket:"telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "satellite" and r._field == "pos_x_km" and r.sat_id == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "pos_x_km")

from(bucket:"telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "satellite" and r._field == "pos_y_km" and r.sat_id == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "pos_y_km")

from(bucket:"telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "satellite" and r._field == "pos_z_km" and r.sat_id == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "pos_z_km")

from(bucket:"telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "satellite" and r._field == "battery_pct" and r.sat_id == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "battery")
